Text: I have read the installation instructions for both NIS 2004 and NAV 2004 prior to installation, but still ended up with the same result...junk software.  Why is it that I can install any other type of software and it installs and works properly?  But if I installed either one of these Norton products, neither works after installation?  McAfee Anti-Virus 8[+2]] It can not be the computer or the owner, since I purchased McAfee Anti-Virus 8 and it installs and works fine with no problems.  I have used Norton for the past 5 years and for the last 2 years, the software has gotten more and more disgraceful.  I am glad that I do not work for Norton.
